twgamebook package¶

This package contains the modules and objects required to play a game book adventure on Twitter, based on a source file from Inklewriter.com.

TWGBStory Class¶

class twgamebook.story.TWGBStory(source)¶

Bases: object

An object for loading JSON files from inklewriter.com and managing the story and it’s stitches

Parameters

source_file (str) – The file path or URL to the source text

Raises

  • KeyError – if a string is not provided to the constructor

  • ValueError – if the source file is not an inklewriter.com JSON object or if the local file could not be found

  • ConnectionError – if there are any network issues connecting to inklewriter.com

  • Timeout – if there is a network timeout connecting to inklewriter.com

  • TooManyRedirects – if there are too many redirects trying to retrieve the JSON file from inklewriter.com

  • HTTPError – if any HTTP code other than 200 is received from inklewriter.com

  • json.JSONDecodeError – if there was an issue decoding the JSON file

Variables

  • title (str) – The title of this story

  • author (str) – The story’s author

  • initial (str) – The initial stitch key to start the story from

  • stitches (list) – The list of stitches that make up the story

  • flags (list) – The list of flags encountered during the story’s progress

get_hashtags(key)¶

Get the hashtags associated with the options

Parameters

key (str) – The key of the stitch containing the options

Returns

A List of hashtags and associated stitch keys

Return type

list

get_section(start_key='', _ret_str='')¶

Read a section of the game until options or an ending is found

Parameters

  • start_key (str) – The key for the starting stitch of the story. Leaving this blank will start the story from the beginning

  • _ret_str (str) – The cumulative previously returned thread, used in recursion

Returns

A list of tweets made up of all the stitches for this section.

Return type

list

set_flags(flags)¶

Set the flags for the story externally

Parameters

flags (list) – A list of flags to set in the story

Returns

True when set.

Return type

bool

TWGBStitch Class¶

class twgamebook.story.TWGBStitch(key, stitch)¶

Bases: object

An object for managing the individual story stitches.

A stitch is a paragraph of text from inklewriter.com and the relevant options for branched story telling. Each stitch will have a unique key as a reference and the text of the paragraph.

Parameters

  • key (str) – The stitch key from the inklewriter source JSON

  • stitch (dict) – The stitch data from the inklewriter source JSON

Variables

  • key (str) – Unique key for this stitch

  • content (str) – Text for this stitch

  • divert (str) – Key for the next stitch in the story. Only provided if there are no options and the story has not ended.

  • options (list) – A list of possible options to follow after this stitch

  • flag_names (list) – A list of flags that should be appended to the story when this stitch is loaded

  • if_conditions (list) – A list of flags that must all be logged in the story for this stitch to be visible

  • not_if_conditions (list) – A list of flags that must not be logged in the story for the stitch to be visible.

  • page_num (int) – The page number from inklewriter

  • page_label (str) – The title for this page or section of the story on inklewriter
